Content: Sri Lanka Navy has commenced a project to regenerate the coral reefs around the island under the directives of Commander of the Navy, Vice Admiral Piyal De Silva. The restoration of coral reefs commenced in the sea off the shores of Kankasanthurai centered on Northern Naval Command yeserday. Accordingly, the naval personnel planted 11 reef balls with replanted corals, at its initial stage The prime aim of the effort is to conserve coral reefs which are subject to continued destruction due to a number of reasons. Further, the Navy will carry out regular monitoring of the project in order to ensure continual growth of the coral nursery.
